mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(stock_code) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT stock_code FROM my_list UNION SELECT DISTINCT stock_code FROM wish_list ) AS b
SELECT COUNT(user_num) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT user_num FROM my_list UNION SELECT DISTINCT user_num FROM wish_list ) AS b

SELECT b.stock_code, b.company_name FROM (SELECT stock_code, COUNT(user_num) AS popular FROM wish_list GROUP BY stock_code ORDER BY popular DESC LIMIT 5 ) AS a JOIN (SELECT stock_code, company_name FROM stock_list) AS b ON a.stock_code = b.stock_code;
SELECT company_name FROM stock_list WHERE stock_code = #{stock_code}
